interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Quantum of Solace (Blu-Ray + DVD Combo)
Review Date: 2014/06/22
Store: Daniel Craig  (Actor),     Mathieu Amalric  (Actor),     Marc Forster  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ["Betrayed by Vesper, the woman he loved, 007 fights the urge to make his latest mission personal. Pursuing his determination to uncover the truth, Bond and M (JUDI DENCH) interrogate Mr. White (JESPER CHRISTENSEN) who reveals the organization which blackmailed Vesper is far more complex and dangerous than anyone had imagined.Forensic intelligence links an Mi6 traitor to a bank account in Haiti where a case of mistaken identity introduces Bond to the beautiful but feisty Camille (OLGA KURYLENKO), a woman who has her own vendetta. Camille leads Bond straight to Dominic Greene (MATHIEU AMALRIC), a ruthless business man and major force within the mysterious organization.On a mission that leads him to Austria, Italy and South America, Bond discovers that Greene, conspiring to take total control of one of the world's most important natural resources, is forging a deal with the exiled General Medrano (JOAQUIN COSIO). Using his associates in the organization, and manipulating his powerful contacts within the CIA and the British government, Greene promises to overthrow the existing regime in a Latin American country, giving the General control of the country in exchange for a seemingly barren piece of land.In a minefield of treachery, murder and deceit, Bond allies with old friends in a battle to uncover the truth. As he gets closer to finding the man responsible for the betrayal of Vesper, 007 must keep one step ahead of the CIA, the terrorists and even M, to unravel Greene's sinister plan and stop his organization."]
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, Widescreen, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed', 'Contributor': 'Olga Kurylenko, Tim Pigott-Smith, Mathieu Amalric, Giancarlo Giannini, Gemma Arterton, Anatole Taubman, Judi Dench, Joaquín Cosio, Jesper Christensen, David Harbour, Jeffrey Wright, Rory Kinnear, Marc Forster, Daniel CraigOlga Kurylenko, Tim Pigott-Smith, Mathieu Amalric, Giancarlo Giannini, Gemma Arterton, Anatole Taubman, Judi Dench, Joaquín Cosio, Jesper Christensen, David Harbour, Jeffrey Wright, Rory Kinnear, Marc Forster, Daniel Craig  See more', 'Language': 'French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (Dolby TrueHD)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 46 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '5.3 x 0.5 x 6.7 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Director': 'Marc Forster', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, Widescreen, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed', 'Run time': '1 hour and 46 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 23, 2012', 'Actors': 'Daniel Craig, Mathieu Amalric, Giancarlo Giannini, Judi Dench, Olga Kurylenko', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Studio': 'MGM (Video & DVD)', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: Great movie.  Daniel Craig makes an excellent James Bond.  Great deal getting a combo pack too.  I hope Craig makes more Bond flicks.
Review Title: Great
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
2CELLOS (Sulic & Hauser) Live at Arena Zagreb
2CELLOS (Sulic & Hauser)  (Actor),     Kristijan Burlovic  (Director)    Rated:    G    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
['2CELLOS new DVD, Live at Arena Zagreb, is an exhilarating live performance filmed in their Croatian homeland to a sold-out audience of over 25,000 fans. Accompanied by the Zagreb Philharmonic Orchestra, the concert includes songs from their self titled debut album as well as their internationally acclaimed second release, IN2ITION. The DVD features 2CELLOS\' massive YouTube hits, "Smooth Criminal" and "Welcome to the Jungle," along with a trio of their popular renditions of AC/DC songs "Back in Black," "You Shook Me All Night Long" and "Highway to Hell." Rounding out the set are their unique covers of songs from Jimi Hendrix, Coldplay, U2, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Nirvana and Sting plus classical repertoire that showcases their unsurpassed virtuosity. Also included is a bonus Behind-the- Scenes feature. Track listing:1.Benedictus (Live)2.Elegie in C Minor, Op. 24 (Live)3.Gabriel\'s Oboe (Live)4.Oblivion (Live)5.Welcome to the Jungle (Live)6.Purple Haze (Live)7.Resistance (Live)8.Californication (Live)9.With Or Without You (Live)10.Where The Streets Have No Name (Live)11.Viva La Vida (Live)12.Human Nature (Live)13.Smooth Criminal (Live)14.You Shook Me All Night Long (Live)15.Highway to Hell (Live)16.Back In Black (Live)17.When I Come Around (Live)18.Smells Like Teen Spirit (Live)19.Fields of Gold (Live)20.Hurt (Live)21.End Credits22.Live at Arena Zagreb: Behind the Scenes']
{'Genre': 'Classical', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, PAL, Import, Classical', 'Contributor': '2CELLOS (Sulic & Hauser), Kristijan Burlovic', 'Language': 'Italian (Dolby Digital 5.1), Czech (DTS 5.1)', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Aspect Ratio': 'Unknown', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Product Dimensions': '3.07 x 0.67 x 7.48 inches; 2.68 Ounces', 'Director': 'Kristijan Burlovic', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, PAL, Import, Classical', 'Run time': '1 hour and 19 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 5, 2013', 'Actors': '2CELLOS (Sulic & Hauser)', 'Subtitles': 'Italian', 'Studio': 'Sony', 'Number of discs': '1'}
I found 2 Cellos music on Youtube, or rather my son found it for me.  I like this music very much and bought this to enjoy them more.
Very nice

profile:
**User Profile Summary**

- **Music Preference**: Strong appreciation for classical crossover genres, particularly cello performances. Enjoys unique interpretations and high-energy performances, with a keen interest in live music experiences.
  
- **Content Consumption**: Engages with music primarily through accessible online platforms, particularly YouTube. Recently demonstrated an interest in film, highlighting a broader entertainment consumption that includes both music and cinema.

- **Family Influence**: Family involvement plays a significant role in music discovery, which extends to an appreciation for movies, indicating collaborative interests with family members in both domains.

- **Purchase Motivation**: Driven by a desire to experience and support favorite artists and actors, as shown through the purchase of live music content and cinematic experiences. Shows a preference for bundle deals that enhance value.

- **Overall Attitude**: Maintains a positive engagement with both music and film, reflected in high ratings and enthusiastic reviews. Values quality performances and the emotional impact of live shows and cinematic storytelling. The user exhibits a strong preference for immersive experiences across various entertainment forms, underlining an appreciation for artistry in both music and film.
